content: this text is about a legal case in the supreme court of croatia it provides a summary of the progress of the case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case is about a legal procedure called cost procedure in the first instance the summary explains that the plaintiff bf is determined to be the coowner of various parcels of real estate including a forest an orchard a pasture and arable land the coownership of one parcel is dissolved with a portion of the forest granted to the plaintiff and the remaining portion coowned by the defendants with modified shares another parcel consisting of a pasture and arable land is also granted to the plaintiff while the remaining parcels are coowned by the defendants with modified shares the defendants are required to acknowledge and allow the plaintiff to be the sole registered owner of the real estate within 15 days the decision in this case is based on article 382 of the act on judicial procedure
